channel.title: Docker on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Dash

item.title: Trouble-Shooting on Docker
item.description: The guideline I follow is from : https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Docker Working behind Proxy When docker runs under the proxy, it will be blocked by the firewall, thus in the ArchLinux we have to kill the systemd started docker daemon, and manually set the proxy configuration for the docker daemon, following is the tips: $ systemctl stop docker.service $ sudo HTTP_PROXY=http://1xx.*.*.2xx:2xx3 docker -d & Then you run the docker for create the new machine will be OK.
